unittitle_ssm: New York State National Guard, 32nd Infantry Regiment vouchers
abstract_ssm: This collection consists of 1877 vouchers issued by the 32nd Infantry Regiment of the New York State National Guard to deliver helmets and fatigue caps from J.C.F. Deecken of New York City to various members.
